ability: W grze jest dwoch dodatkowych outsiderow. [+2 outsiderow]
name: Baron (PL)

ability: You must use a vote token to vote. Dead players may choose to give you theirs. If so, you learn their alignment.
name: Beggar

ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts as 3 votes tomorrow.
firstNightReminder: The Bureaucrat points to a player. Put the Bureaucrat's '3 votes' reminder by the chosen player's character token.
name: Bureaucrat
otherNightReminder: The Bureaucrat points to a player. Put the Bureaucrat's '3 votes' reminder by the chosen player's character token.

ability: Kazdej nocy wybierz gracza (nie siebie). Jutro mozesz glosowac tylko, jesli ten gracz zaglosuje.
firstNightReminder: The Butler points to a player. Mark that player as 'MASTER'.
name: Lokaj
otherNightReminder: The Butler points to a player. Mark that player as 'MASTER'.

ability: Na poczatku gry dowiadujesz sie, ile par zlych graczy siedzi obok siebie.
firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2, …) for the number of pairs of neighbouring evil players.
name: Kucharz

ability: Nie wiesz, ze jestes Pijakiem. Myslisz, ze jestes mieszczaninem, ale Twoja umiejetnosc nie dziala prawidlowo.
name: Pijak

ability: Kazdej nocy dowiadujesz sie, ilu z Twoich zyjacych sasiadow jest zlych.
firstNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of alive evil neighbours of the Empath.
name: Empata
otherNightReminder: Show the finger signal (0, 1, 2) for the number of alive evil neighbours of the Empath.

ability: Kazdej nocy wybierasz 2 graczy - dowiadujesz sie, czy ktorys z nich jest Demonem. Jeden z dobrych graczy pokazuje Ci sie jako zly.
firstNightReminder: The Fortune Teller points to two players. Give the head signal (nod yes, shake no) for whether one of those players is the Demon.
name: Wrozka
otherNightReminder: The Fortune Teller points to two players. Show the head signal (nod 'yes', shake 'no') for whether one of those players is the Demon.

ability: Each day, after the 1st vote has been tallied, you may choose a player that voted: they die.
name: Gunslinger

ability: Kazdej nocy wybierz gracza, ktory umiera. Jesli zabijesz w ten sposob siebie, slugus zostaje demonem.
name: Chochlik
otherNightReminder: The Imp points to a player. That player dies. If the Imp chose themselves: Replace the character of 1 alive minion with a spare Imp token. Show the 'YOU ARE' card, then the Imp token.

ability: Na poczatku gry dowiadujesz sie, ze jeden z dwoch graczy jest konkretnym slugusem.
firstNightReminder: Show the character token of a Minion in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
name: Sledczy

ability: Na poczatku gry dowiadujesz sie, ze jeden z dwoch graczy jest konkretnym outsiderem (lub ze jest ich 0 w grze).
firstNightReminder: Show the character token of an Outsider in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
name: Bibliotekarz

ability: Jesli przy trzech zywych graczach nie nastapi egzekucja, Twoja druzyna wygrywa. Jesli zginiesz noca, inny gracz moze zginac zamiast Ciebie.
name: Burmistrz

ability: Kazdej nocy* wybierz gracza (nie siebie), ktory tej nocy bedzie chroniony przed Demonem.
name: Mnich
otherNightReminder: The previously protected player is no longer protected. The Monk points to a player (not themself). Mark that player as 'PROTECTED'.

ability: Kazdej nocy wybierz gracza, ktorego umiejetnosc nie zadziala tej nocy ani jutro za dnia.
firstNightReminder: The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.
name: Truciciel
otherNightReminder: The previously poisoned player is no longer poisoned. The Poisoner points to a player. That player is poisoned.

ability: Jesli zginiesz noca, budzisz sie i wybierasz gracza - dowiadujesz sie, jaka jest postacia.
name: Hodowca krukow
otherNightReminder: If the Ravenkeeper died tonight: The Ravenkeeper points to a player. Show that player’s character token.

ability: Mozesz pokazac sie jako zly i jako slugus lub demon, nawet po smierci.
name: Odludek

ability: Jesli zginiesz przez egzekucje, Twoja druzyna przegrywa.
name: Swiety

ability: If a player of your alignment is executed, you might be executed instead.
name: Scapegoat

ability: Jesli przy zyciu pozostaje 5 lub wiecej graczy a demon zginie, zostajesz demonem (podroznicy sie nie licza).
name: Kochanica diabla
otherNightReminder: If the Scarlet Woman became the Demon today: Show the 'YOU ARE' card & then the demon token.

ability: Raz w trakcie gry, w ciagu dnia, publicznie wybierasz jednego gracza - jesli jest Demonem, ginie.
name: Pogromca

ability: Nie mozesz zostac zabity przez Demona.
name: Zolnierz

ability: Kazdej nocy zagladasz do grymuaru. Mozesz pokazac sie jako dobry i jako mieszczanin lub outsider, nawet po smierci.
firstNightReminder: Show the Grimoire to the Spy for as long as they need.
name: Szpieg
otherNightReminder: Show the Grimoire to the Spy for as long as they need.

ability: Each night, choose a player (not yourself): their vote counts negatively tomorrow.
firstNightReminder: The Thief points to a player. Put the Thief's 'Negative vote' reminder by the chosen player's character token.
name: Thief
otherNightReminder: The Thief points to a player. Put the Thief's 'Negative vote' reminder by the chosen player's character token.

ability: Kazdej nocy* dowiadujesz sie, ktora postac stracono dzis podczas egzekucji.
name: Grabarz
otherNightReminder: If a player was executed today: Show that player’s character token.

ability: Gdy zostaniesz nominowany po raz pierwszy w grze, a nominuje Cie mieszczanin, zostaje on natychmiast stracony.
name: Dziewica

ability: Na poczatku gry dowiadujesz sie, ze jeden z dwoch graczy jest konkretnym mieszczaninem.
firstNightReminder: Show the character token of a Townsfolk in play. Point to two players, one of which is that character.
name: Praczka
